messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What type of attacks can Cthugha form pseudopods for?
Fighting attacks
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Cthugha's build?
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Cthugha's Damage Bonus?
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Cthugha's Move?
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the attacks Cthugha can make per round?
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of Cthugha's summoning?
Automatic Scorch: Summoned, Cthugha brings 1D100 x10 flame vampires with it, which immediately begin to set the area alight.
You are a helpful assistant.
How do humans in the area react to Cthugha's presence?
Humans in the area lose hit points to the heat, starting in the round after Cthugha comes.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the objective for the players to survive?
The only way to survive is to flee the area—a roughly circular area with a diameter of 2D10 x 20 yards.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Cthulhu's role in the city?
Cthulhu is evidently the high priest and ruler of them all, and is by far the most potent.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the fate of Cthulhu if the area is thoroughly blasted?
Cthugha does not depart until that area has been thoroughly blasted and burned, unless first dismissed by means of a spell.
You are a helpful assistant.
How does Cthulhu depart the area?
Cthulhu departs the area only after it has been thoroughly blasted and burned, or if dismissed by a spell.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Cthulhu's role in his cult?
Cthulhu is the high priest and ruler of the cult.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the belief of Cthulhu's cult regarding Cthulhu's origin?
Cthulhu's cult believes that Cthulhu plunged from the stars with his kin.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the status of other members of Cthulhu's race?
Other members of Cthulhu's race are entombed in the city.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the ultimate goal of the cult when R'lyeh rises?
Members of the cult will come to R'lyeh and open the vast black door, allowing Cthulhu to awaken and rise to wreak havoc across the world.
You are a helpful assistant.
Who is Cthulhu according to the text?
Cthulhu believes that he plunged from the stars with his kin and built a great prehistoric city at R’lyeh, ruling the world.
You are a helpful assistant.
Where does Cthulhu rule the world according to the text?
The world
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to R’lyeh according to the text?
It sinks beneath the sea when the stars change
You are a helpful assistant.
Who serves Cthulhu according to the text?
The beings known as the deep ones and the octopoid things known as the star-spawn of Cthulhu
You are a helpful assistant.
How many names does Cthulhu have according to the text?
Many, most of which can be traced back to their original form
You are a helpful assistant.
What beings serve Cthulhu?
the deep ones and the star-spawn of Cthulhu
You are a helpful assistant.
How many yards does a flame burst cover?
150 yards
You are a helpful assistant.
What must investigators within the area of a flame burst attempt on a CON roll?
an Extreme CON roll (rolling equal to or below one-fifth)
You are a helpful assistant.
What are two of Cthulhu's names?
Tulu and Thu Thu
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Cthulhu's cult like?
prehistoric and of many variants
